courses.title: Study Intonation
courses.description: This course is for everyday discourse skills mastering. Meet the principle tones of English. Learn to produce them when speaking. Starting with quite short common phrases you will browse through a variety of speaking patterns to feel and train the melody of English speech

courses.title: Crash Course
courses.description: Meet the principle tones of English. Learn to produce them when speaking. Starting with quite short common phrases you will browse through a variety of speaking patterns to feel and train the melody of English speech
